title: issue making the game unplayable. please help @Riot.
body: once or twice every game I lost control of my champion. they just either stand there or keep on moving if already told them to do so. I get locked out of controls for about 30 seconds. in this time the game did not dissconect. am simply watching the match going on still and I end up getting killed most of the time because of this. how the fuck do I fix this. I cleanley reinstalled the game. how???. I suddently can't move or do anything in lane or team fights. I can't ping I cant chat. but the game did not disconnect because I can still see that it didn't dc. when it dced enemies usually keep moving and collide with a wall. but here it just happens that am the only one that stops doing anything and everyone else is fine.

Same thing here. Four times in last 2 hours have been DCs during queue and champion select primarily, but happened once during a nexus siege game as well. My ping has remained at about 55 all day, but there have been random DCs. I have been searching ONLINE on google for solutions while the game has been listed as disconnected during these periods.

These delays in input and seeing what's happening are usually caused by an unstable connection to the game server.  It sounds like you're getting packet loss since you're not losing your connection entirely, but you can use our [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to verify.  Go over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot then test it in a custom game.  Let me know how it works out.
